"欢迎使用小米设置。为了向您提供服务，我们需要收集您使用手机的相关信息，包括屏幕解锁次数、各应用名称及使用时长以统计您的屏幕使用情况，亮屏次数、专注模式设置时长以统计您的专注模式使用情况，注视屏幕时长、躺卧注视时长、近距离注视时长和暗光下注视时长以统计您的用眼使用情况。以上数据仅在本地使用。 "

string.name: permission_tip_message
string.Data:
"We'll process the following sensitive personal information of you and your family members when required:
- Location infoFor providing real-time location

- Call historyFor informing you about spam calls received by your family members

- SMS messagesFor informing you about possible SMS fraud

If you don't allow us to collect and share such information, we won't be able to provide you with our services. Note that you should allow providing such information with caution, as your personal safety and privacy might be put at risk once such information is leaked or used illegally. We'll collect and share the above information only for the purpose of providing you with our services.
"

I am aware and confirm cancellation

After you cancel Family Guard services, we will stop collecting your personal information. The personal information already collected will be deleted in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, unless required otherwise. Your family member will no longer be able to guard you remotely (e. g. check your location, view or uninstall the apps you installed).

Welcome to Family Guard (including Settings)! You can use this app to remotely guard minors and other family members (e. g. finding their real-time locations, viewing and uninstalling apps, and viewing Screen time stats).
"Check a child's screen time remotely to ensure healthy use"
Check the current location of family members to prevent them from getting lost
Uninstall dangerous apps to keep children safe
欢迎使用健康使用手机，您可在此查看设备使用时长以及用眼时长，并进行自我约束，点击底部按钮开启服务并授权。
欢迎使用健康使用平板，您可在此查看设备使用时长以及用眼时长，并进行自我约束，点击底部按钮开启服务并授权。
Withdrawing consent will prevent you from remotely guarding minors and other family members, including but not limited to checking their real-time locations, viewing and uninstalling apps, etc.

After you withdraw your consent to the privacy policy for Family Guard, we will stop collecting your personal information. The personal information already collected will be deleted in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, unless required otherwise. Withdrawing consent will prevent you from remotely guarding minors and other family members, including but not limited to checking their real-time locations, viewing and uninstalling apps, etc.
